ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.TEXT: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on building scalable and performant web applications. With expertise in modern frontend frameworks like Angular and backend technologies like Node.js and .NET, I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering high-quality software solutions.
ABOUT.SUBTEXT: I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.
